textBlocks.title: New LEGO® Sets
textBlocks.text: Calling all LEGO® fans! If you love having the latest sets to build, save this page. You can find every new LEGO set we've released in the last 2 months here. From building toys to complex collectables, there’s a wide range to discover. Browse a vast LEGO assortment and filter by age, price, interest and more. You can also find sets that are coming soon, LEGO Exclusives and the most popular LEGO sets here!

disruptor.title: City Sandwich Shop gift with LEGO® purchases over 90 €*
